```{r, include=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************          MELD Score Calculations             **************** #                  
# **************************************************************************** #

hep_b_clean <- hep_b[, -c(3:6,13:20)]

#MELD Score
val_13 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 13]]
val_11 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 11]]
val_13_clamped <- pmax(val_13, 1.0)
val_11_clamped <- pmax(val_11, 1.0)
MELD_score_1 <- ((0.957*log(val_13_clamped)) + (0.378*log(val_11_clamped)) + (1.12*log(hep_b_clean[1,18]) + 0.643)) * 10
val_14 <- hep_b_clean[[1,14]]
val_14_clamped <- pmin(pmax(val_14, 125), 137)
MELD_NA_1 <- MELD_score_1 + 1.32 * (137-val_14_clamped) - (0.033 * MELD_score_1 * (137-val_14_clamped))


val_24 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 24]]
val_22 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 22]]
val_24_clamped <- pmax(val_24, 1.0)
val_22_clamped <- pmax(val_22, 1.0)
MELD_score_2 <- ((0.957*log(val_24_clamped)) + (0.378*log(val_22_clamped)) + (1.12*log(hep_b_clean[1,18]) + 0.643)) * 10
val_25 <- hep_b_clean[[1,25]]
val_25_clamped <- pmin(pmax(val_25, 125), 137)
MELD_NA_2 <- MELD_score_2 + 1.32 * (137-val_25_clamped) - (0.033 * MELD_score_2 * (137-val_25_clamped))


val_35 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 35]]
val_33 <- hep_b_clean[[1, 33]]
val_35_clamped <- pmax(val_35, 1.0)
val_33_clamped <- pmax(val_33, 1.0)
MELD_score_3 <- ((0.957*log(val_35_clamped)) + (0.378*log(val_33_clamped)) + (1.12*log(hep_b_clean[1,40]) + 0.643)) * 10
val_36 <- hep_b_clean[[1,36]]
val_36_clamped <- pmin(pmax(val_36, 125), 137)
MELD_NA_3 <- MELD_score_3 + 1.32 * (137-val_36_clamped) - (0.033 * MELD_score_3 * (137-val_36_clamped))
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************         LFT Format and Spaghetti           **************** #                  
# **************************************************************************** #

#LFT - ALT, AST, Bilirubin

hep_b_sag <- hep_b_clean[, c(1:8)]
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 1` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 1`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 2` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 2`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 3` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 3`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$date2 <- as.numeric(hep_b_sag[[6]] - hep_b_sag[[4]])
hep_b_sag$date3 <- as.numeric(hep_b_sag[[8]] - hep_b_sag[[4]])

#age grouping
hep_b_sag <- hep_b_sag %>%
  mutate(
    age_group = case_when(
      `Age in Years` >= 30 & `Age in Years` <= 50 ~ "30–50",
      `Age in Years` >= 70 & `Age in Years` <= 90 ~ "70–90",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  )

#making data frame
n <- nrow(hep_b_sag)
plot_data <- data.frame(
  id = rep(1:n, each = 3),
  days = as.vector(t(cbind(
    rep(0, n),         # Day 0 for titer 1
    hep_b_sag$date2,   # Day for titer 2
    hep_b_sag$date3    # Day for titer 3
  ))),
  titer = as.vector(t(cbind(
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 1`,
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 2`,
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 3`
  ))),
  age_group = rep(hep_b_sag$age_group, each = 3)
)
```
